about_the_game:
"Kardiya: Winds of Fate" is a narrative-driven RPG set in a world inspired by the cells of the human body. The role-playing mechanics in our game are inspired by the FATE RPG system. Experience the protagonist's journey from birth to death, where every choice you make shapes the story. It's up to you to play the almighty fighter, the witty alchemist, or the charming chatterbox. Build your character, choose their life path, and determine their fate through dice and cards. And remember, no two playthroughs will be the same.

A Vast World Inspired by the Human Body


Imagine the human body as a planet, with organs as countries and cells as sentient beings. Welcome to Gaia! There are 15 countries, 150 cities, 30 unique cultures, 10 religions and 4 different races (Homins, Bacteria, Viruses and Fungi). Along with 200 classes, 150 spells and more than 100 monsters and animals. Delve into a world with 40,000 years of rich history...

A Dark Fantasy Tale


Follow a pace-class Homin on a quest to discover his inner strength. After his father is murdered by his uncle, the Khan of Kardiya, he abandons his noble life. Journeying across Kardiya, he seeks to unlock the power of the relics his family left behind. This Homin will determine the fate of Kardiya, and perhaps all of Gaia, as he confronts the harsh realities, horrors, and cruelties of life.

The game will be released in three episodes. Episode 0, the demo, will be available soon.

Increased Replayability


Every choice you make profoundly alters the story. A simple decision might lead you to dance with skeletons in the mines or cook in a witch’s hut. Additionally, random events encountered throughout your journey ensure that each playthrough is truly one-of-a-kind.

Stat Management


This game blends the choose-your-own-adventure genre with classic role-playing elements. Guide your character from birth to death, improving your skills along the way. Your stats will shape your destiny.

Unique Choose System with Dice-Roll


Want to make a choice, but your stats aren’t up to the task? Your relic (fudge dice) can help you change your fate. Roll the dice and boost your skills to make your choices easier.

Deckbuilding Mechanic


Your aspect cards will determine your fate. Modify your stats with the cards you collect throughout your journey and prepare for a completely different gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content.
